participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and family-oriented, someone who values connections over solitary activities.
participant_1.background: I'm not really into hobbies, but I love to play board games with my family. My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams. I make my living as a professional bowler. I started my own business and now I'm a lot happier. I do my laundry once a week, because that is enough to keep my clothes clean and fresh.

participant_2.name: Jamie Smith
participant_2.personality: Creative and hands-on, always looking for new projects and enjoying practical activities.
participant_2.background: I enjoy tinkering with my car, working on it in the garage and fixing it up. I go to college part time. I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing. It takes me an hour to drive to work in the morning. I enjoy crosswords, crocheting, and football.

content.text: What are you passionate about in life?
I love working on cars. It's a real stress reliever for me to tinker in the garage.
I can see how that would be. I don't really have any hobbies, but I do love playing board games with my family.
Board games can be a lot of fun. What are some of your favorites?
I like to play Monopoly, Clue, and Scrabble. I'm not really into video games.
I'm not really into video games either. I prefer to read or watch TV.
I love to read too. I just finished reading a book about a woman who goes on a journey to find herself.
That sounds really interesting. I'm not much of a reader, but I do enjoy watching TV.
What kind of TV shows do you like to watch?
I like to watch dramas and comedies. I also like to watch documentaries.
I like to watch comedies too. I don't really watch dramas or documentaries.
Well, it sounds like we have a few things in common.
Yeah, we do. I'm glad we met.
